content:
# I currently have 0 Copper Plates in my inventory, which means I need to gather some Copper Ore to smelt into Copper Plates for crafting the Electric Mining Drill.

# Since the Stone Furnace has no ingredients to smelt and is currently idle, I will need to move to the nearest Copper Ore location to gather the necessary resources.

# Let's find the nearest Copper Ore and move there to harvest some.
copper_ore_position = nearest(Resource.CopperOre)  # Finding the nearest Copper Ore position.
move_to(copper_ore_position)  # Moving to the Copper Ore location to harvest.
